tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NNP Know)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD can) (VP (VB turn) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN alarm)) (PP (IN off) (NP (NN tomorrow)))))))) (VP (VBZ makes) (S (NP (PRP me)) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ happy)))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [makes/VBZ nsubj>[Know/NNP dep>[turn/VB mark>that/IN nsubj>I/PRP aux>can/MD dobj>[alarm/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$] nmod:off>[tomorrow/NN case>off/IN]]] xcomp>[happy/JJ nsubj>me/PRP advmod>so/RB] punct>!/.]
